website_summaries.verdict: These stand out for their comfort and style, with some customers loving the shoe so much they own multiple pairs.
pros: This TOMS style offers a great fit, high comfort with all-day wearability, and a stylish look that is easy to dress up or down
We love that they can be worn all day without pain, and offer a dressy look that is still comfortable
cons: A few feel that these run a bit small, and occasionally users experience some issues with rubbing on the ankles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot! Haven't walked all day yet but walked five hours in them and they were very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: D. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Worth a repurchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these boots. I love them! They are comfortable but not too casual, and can be dressed up or down. I can walk all day in them, and the width is great (my feet are slightly wide). If you're wanting to wear thick socks, you'll probably want to size up a half-size. The taupe color does show dirt/grease/water damage after time, but I had my first pair for two years and only gave them up because they were starting to look dingy, so I think I got good use and value out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Pemi

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: wow i am so in love with these shoes. they go with EVERYTHING and fit like a dream. unlike regular toms slips on's that need to be worn several times and put up with several blisters.. these wedges don't need ANY working in. The first time I wore them, I was able to wear them for 4 hours EASILY. I also worse these to my husband's military homecoming and was able to chase my 18 month old daughter around without worrying about stumbling or falling over. Love love love these! my favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Stefan and Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty wide feet and in toms I usually have to get a half size larger than usual. I'm an 8, but ordered these in an 8.5 and they are perfect, and they feel wider than my other toms, so they are very comfortable. The heel is just the right height, not too tall, and they are cute with everything. I'm very happy with this purchase, which for someone with wider feet, is very rare.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and comfortable. They look good with jeans or skirts. The laces are strong, which I really appreciate. Could use a little more arch support, but nothing that insoles can't fix. Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MavenofMusic

customer_reviews.title: Makes your short legs look long
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. The color is spot on and the comfort is on point. I walk at lunch and have kept these shoes on and my feet did not hurt afterwards. It took some getting use to what kind of socks to wear with them, but they do not rub anywhere or throw me off balance. I've worn them with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful shoes. They are very well made and are ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes. They are very well made and are of great quality. The fit is not the best for me, I have a high arch and thin foot. I can only wear them when I know I'll be sitting a lot or just for a few hours of walking/standing. I wish I could wear them more often as they are beautiful but the support is not very good. I bought insoles and it's been able to prolong the wear but they fit a little tighter due to having the insole there. If I'd known I would have bought a 1/2 size bigger to accommodate.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne

customer_reviews.title: They Run small!!but very nice boot.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really cute however they run small. I wear a 5 1/2 and am wearing a 6 1/2 in them.The boots rub my ankles a little, but I am determined to make them work.They are adorable.Love Tom's; they are made well.Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jwr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait for my shoes to get here. As always Tom's came through, I love them they look great with any kind of pants and skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad hip so wearing these all day causes me pain
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so I was surprised how well these fit. I have a bad hip so wearing these all day causes me pain. I bet if there was a platform under the toe section it would level out my foot and ease the pain. Ahhh, the price we pay for style! Super cute shoes and look great with my skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: jmc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite shoe purchase, they were ruined by my dog and I would LOVE to have another pair 😩
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I think they fit true to size and are so comfortable. No breaking in required. Also, they don't walk like some wedges do. The sole has enough give so they aren't hard and "clompy" when you step down.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Best Booties ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loooooove these booties & can't say enough about them! They are super cute & I get so many compliments when I wear them. They are also TTS & pretty darn comfortable. I am just in love with them!
customer_reviews.author: willow

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for the workplace
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with the shoes and on average where them 1 day a week to work. Very comfortable for the workplace. I normally wear a 9 in toms and they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Tom's. These are so comfortable I could run in them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: patricia j.

customer_reviews.title: But like most TOMS
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were really cute. But like most TOMS, I found the sizing somewhat inconsistent. While TOMS flats in size 11 easily fit me, perhaps due to the more rounded toe, these were too snug. Too bad there's not such a thing as size 11.5!
customer_reviews.author: MHolman

customer_reviews.title: I wear these boots every day to work. At ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these boots every day to work. At first they were a little snug but they open right up after a few wears. Can't imagine standing for 12 hours at a time without these!
customer_reviews.author: Vid

customer_reviews.title: I just wear thicker socks and its fine. Pretty much love them in my leggings
customer_reviews.text: Get a ton of compliments. I'm an 8 in normal flat toms. I ordered a 9 in these. They are a little big; I really need an 8.5. But since they only come in whole sizes, I got the 9. I just wear thicker socks and its fine. Pretty much love them in my leggings, jeggings, and flares.
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: but other than that so far they seem to be comfortable for wedges
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 or 10. I went for a 10, there is extra room but thick socks should take care of that. The shoes are a little small vertically in the toe area, as the tops of my toes rub against the shoe, but other than that so far they seem to be comfortable for wedges.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome! The only thing I noticed when they arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome! The only thing I noticed when they arrived is faint scrapes across the top of both shoes. It really isn't that noticeable when you put them on and once they are sprayed. They are super comfortable. Wish I would have bought sooner since now it is winter and I don't want to ruin in the rain/snow!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Portula

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable heel, cute boot, versatile.
customer_reviews.text: These booties are just as expected! They are well made and are comfy, even with the heel. I have sensitive feet and even I can wear them for long periods of time. The color goes with anything. No shoe has an arch support these days...add your own.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Cow

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Wife absolutely loved these shoes. She said they fit a bit big and wish she had a half size smaller... They work though. She will definitely will be buying more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots in a nice color. They add height without feeling too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Belmont

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: - not too narrow, true to size - cushioned foot bed - well-constructed, no fraying at stiching
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and I was able to wear them all day
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these boots! They are very comfortable and I was able to wear them all day! I had tried on a pair at the mall, but they did not have my size so I ordered them from Amazon. They do run a little big so I ordered a size 6. They fit perfect. I think I will order them in black as well! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I went to Dillard's and tride these beauties on and was so happy to find them $30 less on amazon when I got home! They are so comfy you will forget youre wearing heals! The are my new favorite and plan to order ablack pair soon. Also, not dure why the desert color shows up green, I took the chance and they are definitely the perfect taupe color!
customer_reviews.author: brittany johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to wear this EVERYTHING. SO comfortable... I actually walked around Vegas all day in them with no complaints or aches. Good support, great color to go with almost anything. A must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: LIke my shoes :)
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are very comfortables, and goes with everything. used them all day long and no pain at all so am happy with my purchase. May be I'll order another pair in different color.
customer_reviews.author: queenlove

customer_reviews.title: Can I wear them every day?
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST shoes ever. I wear them every chance I get. They are so comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: LEmerson

customer_reviews.title: Can Dress Up or Down
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I wore them to a fall wedding and they were great. Comfortable even for dancing! The tops are snug so if you have wide feet or all arches it might be an issue, but overall I am really glad I purchased these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love these, they're so comfortable and they look nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they're so comfortable and they look nice enough for work or casual. I can walk a good amount in them too. Great city shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I get so many complements in them!! I can stand in them for hours w/o pain. The soles are very rubbery and slip resistant. They are easy to get on and off. The suede is very soft and plyable. Nice quality all around
customer_reviews.author: Adina Morgan

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Very comfortable and came brand new in a box.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes at a great price. These are out of stock pretty much everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY TOMS WEDGES
customer_reviews.text: I love my Toms wedges!!! I plan on getting more in different colors!! Highly recommend! I have to wear closed toed shoes at work and these are even cute with dresses!!
customer_reviews.author: M Ted

customer_reviews.title: SUPER cute! I ended up returning them because I ...
customer_reviews.text: SUPER cute! I ended up returning them because I couldn't pair them with an outfit - unlike everyone else who seems to be able to do so!
customer_reviews.author: CanBMckin

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful item. My wife loves them and says they ...
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful item. My wife loves them and says they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Danny carter

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these shoes! They are so comfortable. I wore them all day and had no issues! The color is great and they can be worn with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Look great, feel okay
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots but they are a little hard on my feet after wearing them all day. I added some soft insoles and that's helped some. The color on screen is way off. As others have mentioned, they're definitely tan/taupe.
customer_reviews.author: ckshuffett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! These are so cute and fit true to size. Great quality! These boots are so versatile and look and feel amazing. Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pairs of these. I was shocked at how comfortable they are and the support that it gave my feet, even after many hours of wear!
customer_reviews.author: Lainie

customer_reviews.title: Great bootie! Looks really nice and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great bootie! Looks really nice and is comfortable. Only one warning--I am a size 5 so I ordered a 5. When I tried them on, my toe touched the end of the shoe. I returned and re-ordered a size 5.5 which fits perfectly. I recommend sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Elmore

customer_reviews.title: A great buy! A good shoe investment.
customer_reviews.text: OMGEEEEE I LOVE these shoes! Very cute, easy to wear business casual to work or just for fun anywhere. Easy to match with anything. And the most comfortable heel shoes I have every owned. Way to go TOMS. :)
customer_reviews.author: Adurr

customer_reviews.title: I love these booties
customer_reviews.text: I love these booties. I got the gray pair in my Stitch Fix box so was happy when I saw the Taupe pair on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Marovich

customer_reviews.title: What the others said
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, stylish, comfortable, easy to match to outfits. Ties don't always stay tied, but maybe that's just a reflection of my tying ability. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Y. M. Z. P.

customer_reviews.title: for a boot it's too tight to wear with socks ...
customer_reviews.text: for a boot it's too tight to wear with socks and a tad short too. Cute but not worth it for this price, will return.
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It's one of my favorite shoes to pair with my blue jeans. Very comfortable pair of booties.
customer_reviews.author: Venus_24

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They are comfortable, although I wouldn't say that I'd wear them all day. The shoes pair nicely with a variety of clothing styles. They ran true to size for me. The shoestrings do come untied pretty easy and the shoes aren't very easy to slip on. This is all forgiven as I find myself grabbing these shoes frequently to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous in NC

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking Toms!
customer_reviews.text: Tried them on, fit as expected but haven't worn them yet. They look nice and I look forward to having them for the fall!:)
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: overall great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: overall great quality shoe. they aren't super comfortable if doing a lot of walking or if you plan to be on your feet for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter and Amber Clem

customer_reviews.title: These are so so comfortable from the time I put them on
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 10 but bought an 11 to be on the safe side. These are so so comfortable from the time I put them on. They definatly have more of a taupe color than the picture shows but I will definatly be ordering on more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and very cute
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I get a lot of compliments on these. very comfortable and worth spending the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dj Whiz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these for a full day yet but so far I love them! They're super comfortable and the cutest shoes ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Alt

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!!! So adorable and comfortable!!! Fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love them! I get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I get compliments all the time. The suede gets dirty easily but a microfiber towel with vinegar easily takes dirty spot out.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. LOVE. LOVE these Toms booties! My husband got them for me for Christmas. They are the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jared/Tina Pratt

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these! They are adorable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! They are adorable and pretty comfortable! They are true to size. I wear a size 9.5 regularly but a 9 in TOMs flats. The booties fit in a 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K Elsen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, perfect for every day wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cheaper pair at first to try and save a few $$ but returned them right away and ordered TOMS. So glad I did, it was worththe extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Malorie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend she loves them. If you have ever bought Tom's you know why.
customer_reviews.author: Dion T.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and style
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, i put arch supports in since mine is high and they are perfect now
customer_reviews.author: CDre

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They fit true to size and they are very comfortable! I'm going to order another pair in black!
customer_reviews.author: Lorilea Conyer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice in color and the size is right . It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  Bolton

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are great - fit as expected and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great - fit as expected and comfortable. They are NOT this green color. I knew that when I ordered because I had seen the Desert Taupe color elsewhere. They are a taupe-khaki color and go with most everything.
customer_reviews.author: Blair C

customer_reviews.text: These shoes where so beautiful! I love them so much. I took one look at them and thought "I love these, I need them" They where shipped in 2 days, As expected. I can't wait to wear these!! Will buy again! <3
customer_reviews.author: Carrena

customer_reviews.title: Love Love, love! !!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. However, I got a spot of oil on one of them, and I cannot get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They hit a little funny on the front of my ankle
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these booties! They hit a little funny on the front of my ankle, but I suspect with wear, that will loosen up. They are very cute and SO comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel English

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These booties are so cute and really comfy! I don't wear heels all the time, but I could wear these walking and standing a lot. The wedge creates great arch support!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Siefert

customer_reviews.title: Good looking!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn them yet but they look really good and seem to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and comfortable. The color is not the same as shown. Mine are more of a moss green. I replaced the laces with elastic no tie ones as the originals come undone unless knotted. More expensive than similar shoes of other brands.
customer_reviews.author: gardengal

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The wedge makes them comfortable all day long and they look great. My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! They are comfortable and fit true to size! Very happy with my purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hainline

customer_reviews.title: they are still the most comfortable shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I have wider feet and these shoes are a bit tight around the front of my feet but even with that, they are still the most comfortable shoes I've owned. The first night I wore them, I had them on for six hours (standing the whole time) and my feet did not hurt one bit!!!! No blisters, no soreness. These shoes are so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Live these shoes. Very comfortable. They are perfect for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these TOMS!
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally an 8 in Toms flats, but ordered these in an 8.5 to accommodate socks. They fit perfectly. So cute and comfortable. Look great with skinny jeans! Will definitely wear these a lot this fall. I love TOMS!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Andrews

customer_reviews.title: I still like them.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tight around my instep on one for only.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Nance

customer_reviews.title: Cute booties!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Get ton of compliments on my " cute little booties". Very comfy and I have problem feet and knees.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes! They go with everything and are comfortable to wear all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Fit great and color is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and cozy! I am not normally a fan of anything other than flats and I love these!

customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very comfy. These booties will go with everything.

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy and cute. Fit true to size.

customer_reviews.title: the shoes are comfortable and can be worn for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to going out shoes! I will be buying more in other colors. They take some time to get them worn in but once they are, the shoes are comfortable and can be worn for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Janaye

customer_reviews.title: Love these booties
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly and are very comfortable. They are well made and great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Very comfortable to wear even walking around the mall.
customer_reviews.author: JRKR

customer_reviews.title: cute but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like how they look but the wedge is way too high and puts pressure right on the ball of my foot. I knew when trying them on and walking around the house that there was no way I'd be able to wear them for more than an hour or so. They have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Ruffin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Things TOMS are great! Fits true to size and looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Things TOMS are great! Fits true to size and looks awesome! Goes well with any outfit really but I can't wait to get my hands on a black pair.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with the shoe!! Just wish they weren't so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful! I've worn Classic Toms and the Nepal boots ...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I've worn Classic Toms and the Nepal boots for about 10 years and decided to try the wedges. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable shoe- fits great. Rubbed slightly against my ankles in the beginning, but broke in quickly. Comfortable and stylish!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel great. Very comfortable. Could use more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K.

customer_reviews.title: I love how they match pretty much everything and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes regularly! I love how they match pretty much everything and they are comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: ... a little hesitant to order these because I don't like suede shoes but I am so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order these because I don't like suede shoes but I am so happy I did!!! They are super, super comfortable and the quality is excellent!!!! Hate to say it but I can't wait for fall to arrive!!
customer_reviews.author: UrbanMomof2

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Need to save for more
customer_reviews.text: These were my first Toms purchase. I could wear these everyday. Very comfortable. Need to save for more colors
customer_reviews.author: Becky Morabito

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes & received loads of compliments on them. My only issue was the security tag was still attached. That was a bit problematic getting off.
customer_reviews.author: Ilvtx

customer_reviews.title: I love these TOMS!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Very trendy and yet extremely comfortable! Great when paired with skinny jeans or skirts and dresses. Perfect for fall!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are stylish and comfortable. Want to buy more colors!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Able to wear this wedge boot all day while teaching.

customer_reviews.title: Try them you might like them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and even got compliments from men wanting to buy their wives a pair. The shoes are versatile and comfortable to walk in with or without socks.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very cute and comfortable. Product exactly as described. Wish they still had more colors in stock in my size. I would have definitely bought more.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable you can walk in them the while day right out of the box!

product_meta.title: TOMS Taupe Suede Women's Desert Wedges 10002947
product_meta.description: Toms Taupe Suede Women's Desert Wedges 10002947
feature_bullets: The simplest way to add a dash of chic to your everyday look
